properties.address: Bentham Community Library, Near Lancaster, North Yorkshire LA2 7HG
properties.description: The Library is accessible via a lift and is open within the following times: Monday 14:30 to 17:00 Wednesday 10:00 to 14:00 Friday 14:30 to 16:30 Saturday 10:00 to 12:00 noon We have a warm, cosy space where you can join the library if you wish to access all the services it offers or simply enjoy the warm space. Please note we close for Christmas from 16:30 on Friday 19th December 2025 and re-open at 14:30 Monday 5th January 2026.
properties.title: Bentham Community Library

properties.description: Our libraries in Lancashire are all warm, safe and welcome spaces. You don't need to be a member of the library to visit our space. Joining the library is free if you want to be a member and borrow books, access our free book, audio, newspaper and magazine download services.
properties.title: Bolton-le-Sands Library

properties.description: Our libraries in Lancashire are all warm, safe and welcome spaces. You don't need to be a member of the library to visit our space. Joining the library is free if you want to be a member and borrow books, access our free book, audio, newspaper and magazine download services.

properties.title: Halton Library

properties.description: We hire the cafe premises at the Cornerstone where we serve Tea & Coffee , cake or a biscuit followed by a warm snack ( usually a freshly made soup) at 12 noon.
properties.title: Lancaster Men's Hub Elevenses at The Cornerstone

properties.description: We are open for Tea and Coffee and biscuits. We have free WIFI and a range of activities jigsaws, board games, art and crafts. Other activities take place at different times including Woodwork workshop, Walking Football, Subbuteo table football, Nautical interest group etc.
properties.title: Lancaster Men's Hub Warm Space at The LMH Studio

properties.address: The Cornerstone, Sulyard Street,, Lancashire, Lancashire LA1 1PX
properties.description: Warm and welcoming cafe space with free Wi-Fi than can seat up to 30 people. Three toilets, including one standard disabled toilet and 1 'changing place'. Fairtrade coffee from the bean. Games available and opportunities to get involved with other groups.
properties.title: Simon Stewart

properties.address: The Centre @ Halton, Lancaster, Lancaster LA2 6NB
properties.description: A vibrant and friendly space in the heart of the community, open to all.
properties.title: The Centre @ Halton

properties.description: Open to all. Come in for a bowl of hot soup , home made cakes, tea or coffee and a chat.
properties.title: The Community Cafe

properties.description: A small comfortable space offering tea and coffee, plus a wide range of activities such as board games, cards, chess & backgammon. Men's Hub activities will also occur and can be joined.
properties.title: The Studio
